summary: Experienced software engineer with expertise in full-stack development and cloud technologies. Passionate about building scalable applications and leading technical teams. Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions and mentoring junior developers.

bulletPoints: Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript and Python, serving over 100,000 daily active users
Led a team of 3 junior developers on multiple projects, improving code quality and reducing bug rate by 40%
Improved application performance by optimizing database queries, resulting in 50% faster page load times
Collaborated with product managers to define feature requirements and technical specifications
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Designed and developed RESTful APIs that handle over 1 million requests per day
Mentored junior developers through code reviews and pair programming sessions
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, supporting multiple client applications
Created responsive frontend interfaces with React and TypeScript, improving user engagement by 35%
Implemented automated testing with Jest and React Testing Library, achieving 85% code coverage
Deployed applications to AWS cloud infrastructure using EC2, S3, and CloudFront
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, reducing API response time by 60%
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components and maintain design consistency
Developed responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Worked with PHP and MySQL to build dynamic web applications and content management systems
Participated in agile development processes including daily standups and sprint planning
Fixed bugs and implemented new features based on client requirements and feedback
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and QA engineers

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Developed a collaborative task management application with real-time updates using WebSockets

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Created a weather dashboard application that displays current conditions and forecasts for multiple cities
